thread.title: London's new electric black cab looks to go global

title: London's new electric black cab looks to go global
text:
London's new electric black cab looks to go global Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 01:56 
London's iconic black cab has gone electric in a bid to bring more fresh air to the Big Smoke, and the makers have now set their sights on becoming the world's green taxi. Matthew Stock reports.
